message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase this product. I believe it would be highly beneficial for you. I'm asking for $11,000.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $9,000 is a tempting offer, the true value of this product is significantly higher.  How about we settle at $10,500?
I'm still interested in the product, but $10,500 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $9,500?
